features: ✔ADJUSTABLE STRAP & COLLAPSIBLE SHAPE – The car trash can features an adjustable strap that allows it to be attached on both front and back headrest as well as the center console for easier access for all around. Coupled with the collapsible design, you will greatly benefit from functional convenience of this auto trash container.

✔MAGNETIC SNAPS: There are 4 metallic magnetic snaps inside of HOTOR car trash can for fastening the extra trash bag. Compared with traditional car trash cans, those 4 little snaps make the replacement of car trash bags easier. Simply unsnap the magnetic snaps to replace the used trash bag with a new one. Then snap shut the magnetic snaps to fix the extra trash bag. Just 2 steps and and it's all set.
✔DURABLE LEAKPROOF INNER LINING – This garbage can for car adopt waterproof and leakproof material, easy to clean and wash. No more worry about food spills or other stubborn stain.

✔MULTIPURPOSE – This car garbage bin can be used as storage bag to keep items such as cups, toys, and other accessories. Additionally, the waterproof advantage also makes it an excellent car cooler of the maximum value for money.

✔GREAT COMPATIBILITY – An effective solution for people with the needs of neat and organized car interior. Perfectly fits a variety of types including sedans, SUV, truckers, etc. HOTOR takes every conceivable possibility into account.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: HOTOR CAR TRASH CAN - A MUST HAVE FOR YOUR CAR! SPACE LESS, LARGE CAPACITY Are you often annoyed by messy interior environment of your car? HOTOR specially designed this Car Organizer to help you out! You can use it to store the tissues, wrappers, napkin, bottles and even unfinished drinking anywhere and anytime!
HOTOR Car Trash Can with Lid and Storage Pockets Previous page Next page
With adjustable strap, this auto trash container can be placed anywhere Previous page Next page
HOTOR takes every conceivable possibility into account Previous page Next page

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I originally bought the "trash can that fits in your cup holder" but then realized that this would only fit a few tissues. I drive an SUV and have a toddler, so I knew i had to buy something bigger. After searching high and low I decided to give this one a chance. This trash compartment comes in folded and uses stiff bands to keep the top in shape. They go out on the OUTSIDE of the bag (and under the handle) because the instructions did not really indicate this. They can be a pain to place, but I finally got them in! This thing is a size of a lunch box and completely waterproof inside. So that means, cleaning is a breeze. The opening is on the top in which you can throw things in. So, just make sure that if you have liquids inside, to not let this thing roll around your car. You'll be sad, but in the meantime, you'll be happy you got this. Item is study, looks great and and even better price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a good size and seems to be made pretty well! Worth the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: it’s very nice although it rlly doesn’t hold much and atleast for my car it doesn’t stay up very well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EASY TO USE
reviews.reviewText: Cute flamingo design, easy to put in car. Large capacity with sturdy strap and cover/top prevents trash from spilling/smelling. Installed on back of passenger seat and with the flap top opening super easy to use while driving. Also comes with 2 plastic trash bags allowing quick disposal. Purchased 3, two for gifts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The trash bag fit exactly where I needed it - behind the center console. I haven't used it too long but I can see it would last due to it's quality materials. Was easy to put together. It helped to add a small piece of cardboard inside the back part of the bag to reinforce the backing a little better. I don't think the bag needed the reinforcement though but where I wanted it placed, I think helped it to stay in place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It is a cheaply made trash can for your car. Does the job, but not for me
reviews.reviewText: I was a bit disappointed in the cheap look to this, but it does it's job sufficiently. I don't like the awkward way it hangs from the car seat, and the top flaps that the trash is put into are very cheaply put together, but it works to collect trash as advertised. The plastic pieces to make the sides rigid and make the can hold it's shape are hard to put in, and one side had to be forced and worked at for a long time to get it in, again because it is cheaply made, so the sides were not uniformly stitched. For the price, it is sufficient, but don't expect it to hold up to any rough use, or heavy trash. For your basic wrappers and tissues etc it is fine. It is not very large, so trash from a McDonald's value meal will pretty much fill it unless you tear up your cup and fry container into small pieces. If you get a plastic cup from another restaurant, expect to need to empty this can every time. If I had it to do again, I would spend a little more and pay better attention to the quality and size as well as how it would attach to the seat, or other ways to secure it in my car. It is fine for small paper trash in a car bigger than mine (I have a compact car so it is right in the lap of any backseat passenger, or I have to uninstall/reinstall every time). Other than the cheap look of the materials, and it not being a good fit for me and my car, it is suitable. It is basically as advertised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my car and it has been a lifesaver. This went through a pretty bad car accident and still held up and I am using it in my current car. During road trips, this was really perfect for getting trash out of our areas without having to get out and throw everything out. This also is adjustable and fits around all of my seats.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Must Have Product!
reviews.reviewText: We bought these HOTOR Car Trash Cans when we were going on our cruise in 2023 and were going to be in our car for 7+ hours driving to the port. We had 5 people in a F-150 and instead of using these as trash cans as intended we actually used them for snack storage so that the passengers in the back could have their snacks in front of them if they needed them on the long drive. But even after the cruise they’re still in my truck and we now use them as trash cans when we need them. They hang easily on the back of the seat and are out of the way of the passengers in the back plus the passenger sitting in the seat its hanging on. We REALLY hate dirty cars, so these bags really help keep the truck tidy.Would definitely recommend these to those looking for a trash can for their vehicle. They are easy to use and install in the vehicle and work great! And when they need to be cleaned you just take them off the seat and wipe out with a wet cloth.
La publicidad muestra un utensilio rígido, lo cual es falso.
